description: (T1) REAR Garden -Evergreen Magnolia(M.dealbata)-reduce crown by 25%(0.75m) to suitable growth points -reduce lateral spread to match(0.75m) to suitable growth(T2) - REAR Garden  Cotoneaster(C.frigidus)-reduce crown by 30%(2m regrowth) to suitable growth points -trim lateral,branches to match, shape, balance and tidyFrom neighbouring garden(T3) - REAR Garden  Damson(Prunus domestica 'Institia')-from ground level, trim back all overhanging branch growth to boundary line(T4) - FRONT Garden  Magnolia(M.soulangea)-reduce crown by 25%(0.6m) to suitable growth points-prune lateral branch growth to match, shape, balance and tidy-thin crown by 10% to allow more light through canopyAll works are for routine maintenance.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
